--- revoke_change_stream_privilege.sql
REVOKE SELECT ON CHANGE STREAM cs_name_one, cs_name_two FROM ROLE hr_manager
--- AST
&ast.Revoke{
  Revoke:    0,
  Privilege: &ast.SelectPrivilegeOnChangeStream{
    Select: 7,
    Names:  []*ast.Ident{
      &ast.Ident{
        NamePos: 31,
        NameEnd: 42,
        Name:    "cs_name_one",
      },
      &ast.Ident{
        NamePos: 44,
        NameEnd: 55,
        Name:    "cs_name_two",
      },
    },
  },
  Roles: []*ast.Ident{
    &ast.Ident{
      NamePos: 66,
      NameEnd: 76,
      Name:    "hr_manager",
    },
  },
}

--- SQL
REVOKE SELECT ON CHANGE STREAM cs_name_one, cs_name_two FROM ROLE hr_manager
